name: Roan
text: Hi, you should be very vigilant here in the grassland!

name: Roan
text: I found some interesting places while walking around. Maybe adventures are waiting for you there?

name: Roan
text: I am not the type for adventures ...

name: Roan
text: My colleague and I prefer to live here in the grassland. But you can visit him once.

name: Roan
text: We live on the small mountain where he sells new equipment to brave adventurers.
